Select

Use the select component to allow users to make a selection in a list with predefined options. It is recommended to use this component only when there are 5 or more options. For fewer options, use the radio component instead.

Installation 

                  
                    npm i @govflanders/vl-ui-select

or 

                  
                    yarn add @govflanders/vl-ui-select

Usage

Import SASS 

                  
                  @import "vl-ui-select/src/scss/select";

Make sure your sass --include-path includes node_modules/@govflanders/.

Import JS

                  
                  import { Select } from '@govflanders/vl-ui-select';

Info and options

[data-vl-select] Initializes search behavior for a select component. [data-vl-select-search-empty-text="Geen resultaten gevonden"] Displays a custom message when no matching select options are found for the search term. [data-vl-select-search="false"] Disables the default search functionality. [disabled] Disables the select component. [data-vl-select-deletable] Adds a cross icon to delete the selected option.

Select

Basic appearance of the select component

      
          <label for="vl-select-select-1"
    class="vl-form__label __field__label">Kies een stad of land</label>
  <select name="vl-select-default"
    id="vl-select-select-1"
    class="vl-select--block vl-select vl-select--block"
    tabindex="0" ><optgroup label="Landen"><option value="België">België</option><option value="Duitsland">Duitsland</option><option value="Frankrijk">Frankrijk</option></optgroup><optgroup label="Steden"><option value="Brugge">Brugge</option><option value="Brussel">Brussel</option><option value="Gent">Gent</option></optgroup></select>

Select with search

The select component with search functionality

      
          
      
      <label for="vl-select-select-2"
    class="vl-form__label">
    Kies een stad of land
  </label>
  <select name="vl-select-select-2"
    id="vl-select-select-2"
    class="vl-select vl-select--block"tabindex="0" data-vl-select data-vl-select-search-empty-text="Geen resultaten gevonden">
    <optgroup label="Landen"><option value="België">België</option><option value="Duitsland">Duitsland</option><option value="Frankrijk">Frankrijk</option></optgroup><optgroup label="Steden"><option value="Brugge">Brugge</option><option value="Brussel">Brussel</option><option value="Gent">Gent</option></optgroup>
  </select>

Select without search

The select component without search functionality, disable the search by adding the [data-vl-select-search="false"] attribute.

      
          
        
    <label for="vl-select-select-3"
    class="vl-form__label">
    Kies een stad of land
  </label>
  <select name="vl-select-select-3"
    id="vl-select-select-3"
    class="vl-select vl-select--block"tabindex="0" data-vl-select data-vl-select-search="false">
    <optgroup label="Landen"><option value="België">België</option><option value="Duitsland">Duitsland</option><option value="Frankrijk">Frankrijk</option></optgroup><optgroup label="Steden"><option value="Brugge">Brugge</option><option value="Brussel">Brussel</option><option value="Gent">Gent</option></optgroup>
  </select>

Select disabled

The select component disabled, add the [disabled] attribute to ensure that the select functionality is not available.

      
          
  
  
    
  <label for="vl-select-select-4"
    class="vl-form__label">
    Kies een stad of land
  </label>
  <select name="vl-select-select-4"
    id="vl-select-select-4"
    class="vl-select vl-select--block"tabindex="0" data-vl-select  disabled>
    <optgroup label="Landen"><option value="België">België</option><option value="Duitsland">Duitsland</option><option value="Frankrijk">Frankrijk</option></optgroup><optgroup label="Steden"><option value="Brugge">Brugge</option><option value="Brussel">Brussel</option><option value="Gent">Gent</option></optgroup>
  </select>

Select deletable

The select component that allows deleting the selected option, add the [data-vl-select-deletable] attribute to enable this delete option.

      
          
        
    <label for="vl-select-select-5"
    class="vl-form__label">
    Kies een stad of land
  </label>
  <select name="vl-select-select-5"
    id="vl-select-select-5"
    class="vl-select vl-select--block" data-vl-select-deletable tabindex="0" data-vl-select data-vl-select-search="false">
    <optgroup label="Landen"><option value="België">België</option><option value="Duitsland">Duitsland</option><option value="Frankrijk">Frankrijk</option></optgroup><optgroup label="Steden"><option value="Brugge">Brugge</option><option value="Brussel">Brussel</option><option value="Gent">Gent</option></optgroup>
  </select>

Select with dynamic data

The select component that gets (a)synchronous data.

      
          
  <label for="vl-select-"
    class="vl-form__label">
    Kies een stad of land
  </label>
  <select name="vl-select-dynamic"
    id="vl-select-dynamic"data-vl-select-deletable>
    <option placeholder>Selecteer item</option>
  </select>

Public methods

There are several public methods available, next to dress and dressAll. undressAll() This method destroys all select components, it equals a reset to the begin state. removeActive(select) This method removes the active option. It sets the select value to empty or to the placeholder. It needs the select attribute to work. setValueByChoice(select, value) This method sets the value of the select component. It has 2 attributes: select and value. enable(select) and (select) This method sets the select component to disabled or enabled. It has the select attribute. Use these methods as follows: vl-select.removeActive(select), where select is an element.

Accessibility

Take into account that only the standard select component is fully accessible. Avoid using the variant with the search functionality.
